column3: This is a follow-up to IDEA-156324. Sometimes people use collection.stream().forEachOrdered(...) (GitHub search) which also could be replaced with collection.forEach(...). This PR enhances SimplifyStreamApiCallChainsInspection to support forEachOrdered.

Have you submitted a contributor license agreement? If not, please download the PDF from http://www.jetbrains.org/display/IJOS/Contributor+Agreement and then print it out, sign (mention you github account name there), scan and email to contribute@jetbrains.com
We've merged the pull request. Thanks for the contribution!
